original: Freeman, Caril Ernst Theodor, komminister, Göteborg, f. 10/9/93 i Gbg av sem:lär. Anton Ferdinand F. o. Hedvig Amanda Lundin. G. 21 m. Svea Margareta Håkansson. Barn: Lars f. 22, fil. kand., Staffan 25, stud., Karin 30, stud. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 13, fil. kand. 17, teoll. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Visby stift 20. Dom-kyrkoadj. i Visby 21, kommin. i Kulltorps past. 24, kyrkoadj. i Partille 27, kommin. i Annedal i Gbg sed. 33. Led. av kyrkofullm. i Gbg 35-38 o. av stads-fullm. där fr. 47, uts. t. orator v. prästmötet i Gbg 51. Skr.: Viktor Rundgren, pülgrim o. predikare (38), En onyttig tjänare (dikt. 39), Det religiösa livet i Gbg (upps. i en monogr. över Gbg).
translated: Freeman, Caril Ernst Theodor, parish priest, Gothenburg, b. 10/9/93 in Gothenburg to seminary teacher Anton Ferdinand F. and Hedvig Amanda Lundin. Married in 1921 to Svea Margareta Håkansson. Children: Lars b. 1922, BA, Staffan b. 1925, student, Karin b. 1930, student. Graduated from high school in 1913, earned a BA in 1917, a degree in industrial engineering, passed practical theology exam, and was ordained in 1920 in Visby diocese. Cathedral curate in Visby in 1921, parish priest in Kulltorp in 1924, assistant priest in Partille in 1927, and parish priest in Annedal in Gothenburg from 1933. Member of the church council in Gothenburg from 1935-1938 and the city council from 1947, appointed as an orator at the clergy meeting in Gothenburg in 1951. Writings: "Viktor Rundgren, pilgrim and preacher" (1938), "An Unprofitable Servant" (poetry, 1939), "Religious Life in Gothenburg" (essay in a monograph on Gothenburg).
